models.title: Text Embedding
models.description: Portkey supports the text embedding API for Nomic models

notSupported.promptPlayground: Prompt playground is not supported for Nomic models

models.note: Portkey currently does not support the image embedding API for Nomic models

portkeyPythonSDK.description: Use Portkey Python SDK to make text embeddings calls to Nomic models
portkeyPythonSDK.codeExample: sample python code for nomic-embed-text-v1 text embedding call on Nomic

portkeyNodeSDK.description: Use Portkey Node.js SDK to make text embeddings calls to Nomic models
portkeyNodeSDK.codeExample: sample node.js code for nomic-embed-text-v1 text embedding call on Nomic

restAPI.description: Use Portkey's REST API to make text embeddings calls to Nomic models
restAPI.codeExample: sample rest api code for nomic-embed-text-v1 text embedding call on Nomic

openAIPythonSDK.description: Use OpenAI Python SDK to make text embeddings calls to Nomic models
openAIPythonSDK.codeExample: sample openai SDK python code for nomic-embed-text-v1 text embedding call on Nomic

openAINodeSDK.description: Use OpenAI Node.js SDK to make text embeddings calls to Nomic models
openAINodeSDK.codeExample: sample openai SDK node.js code for nomic-embed-text-v1 text embedding call on Nomic

integrationViaVirtualKey.description: Integrate Nomic using Portkey's virtual key system

inline.text: Get your API key from Nomic and add it to Portkey to create a virtual key.
inline.description: You can get your Nomic API key from the Nomic website [here](https://atlas.nomic.ai/).

portkeyPythonSDK.description: Initialize Portkey with the virtual key in Python
portkeyPythonSDK.codeExample: sample python SDK code for nomic-embed-text-v1 text embedding call on Nomic using virtual key

portkeyNodeSDK.description: Initialize Portkey with the virtual key in Node.js
portkeyNodeSDK.codeExample: sample node.js SDK code for nomic-embed-text-v1 text embedding call on Nomic using virtual key

restAPI.description: Use Portkey's REST API to make text embeddings calls to Nomic models
restAPI.codeExample: sample rest api code for nomic-embed-text-v1 text embedding call on Nomic using virtual key
